data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Janssen, Helen Y., Pham, Cuong T., Ngo, Hanh Thi, Le, Minh Duc, Nguyen, Truong Q., Ziegler, Thomas (2019): A new species of Lycodon Boie, 1826 (Serpentes, Colubridae) from northern Vietnam. ZooKeys 875: 1-29, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.875.35933, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.875.35933
